comments.body: Oh, the change I described is in #36441? I'm a little confused.

@malept #36441 will be open for review after this PR. So people who use electron-osx-sign 13.x can use the correct types, too.

I'm also against copypasta, but to import `electron-osx-sign`, https://github.com/microsoft/types-publisher/pull/627 needs to be merged. And this sometimes takes a few days... :slightly_smiling_face:

> is that valid typescript?

I did say "something like" as my TypeScript skills are not very good. @ffflorian answered my question.
